Cat Goes Fishing is a casual 2D fishing game developed and published by Cat5Games in 2015. It is available on various platforms, including Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS. In this game, you play as a cat who goes on a fishing adventure to catch different types of fish and earn money.

## Gameplay

At the start of the game, the player receives a basic fishing rod and a small boat. The objective is to catch as many fish as possible, sell them, and earn money to upgrade your fishing rod, boat, and other equipment. The game has various locations, each with its unique types of fish and challenges, such as avoiding predators or fishing in deep waters.

To catch a fish, the player needs to choose the bait, cast the fishing line, and wait for the fish to bite. Once caught, the player can sell the fish in the store and earn money, which can be spent on upgrades, such as a stronger fishing line, better bait, or a motor for the boat.

## Features

- Various types of fish to catch
- Upgradeable equipment, including fishing rods, boats, and bait
- Multiple locations to explore
- Challenging gameplay with different types of fish and obstacles
- Relaxing and immersive soundtrack
- Achievements to unlock

## Mechanics

The game mechanics are simple and easy to learn. The player needs to choose the bait and cast the fishing line with a mouse click. Once the fish bites, the player needs to reel the fishing line by moving the mouse back and forth. The difficulty increases as the player progresses to higher levels and locations, with more challenging fish and obstacles to overcome.

## Conclusion

Cat Goes Fishing is a fun and addictive casual game that offers hours of gameplay. It combines simple mechanics, challenging gameplay, and relaxing music, making it an enjoyable experience for players of all ages. It is a perfect game for anyone who loves fishing or just wants to relax and unwind. If you are looking for a fun and entertaining game that offers a unique fishing experience, Cat Goes Fishing is definitely worth a try.
